title: Raptures : an underwater odyssey
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Barrier Reef (Qld.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Coral reefs and islands

Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Coral reefs and islands
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Great Barrier Reef (Qld.)
description: David Hannan and his team have travelled to new locations to films this sequel to the fantastic "Coral Sea dreaming". This extroadinary musical documentary is the culmination of 7 years filming in Micronesia, the Indian Ocean, the Coral Sea and the Great Barrier Reef. Stunning new cinematic techniques deliver vision of exceptional quality complemented by a musical score composed by Vance Burrow. This is an intoxicating musical journey capturing the beauty and diversity of our fragile ocean realm which can be used as a tool for stress release and meditation
